DataElement.preferredName: Dental Pulp Exposure Dental Dam Placement Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A richly vascularized and innervated connective tissue of mesodermal origin contained in the central cavity of a tooth and delimited by the dentin. It has formative, nutritive, sensory, and protective functions. Contact with infectious agents (bacteria or viruses) in a manner that promotes transmission and increases the likelihood of disease. A thin sheet of rubber that is fitted over the mouth and perforated to expose certain teeth that acts as a moisture barrier during dental procedures. Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study. The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

Concepts.definition: A richly vascularized and innervated connective tissue of mesodermal origin contained in the central cavity of a tooth and delimited by the dentin. It has formative, nutritive, sensory, and protective functions.
The act of subjecting someone or something to an influencing experience.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

Concepts.definition: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Time is the continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.  It may also refer to a specific point in this continuum or to the interval separating two points.  It is generally measured in minutes, days, months, or years.

Concepts.definition: The continuum of experience in which events pass from the future through the present to the past.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If no, approximate time from
ReferenceDocuments.description: If no, approximate time from pulp exposure until rubber dam was placed
